The inaccurate portrayal of the top imag: which actually depicts children released from Auschwitz concentration camp, while the claim suggests it represents the treatment of migrant children in the U.S.
The misleading use of the bottom image: which is not from 2018, not related to the United States, and does not show migrant children in detention. It instead shows Palestinian children at a soup kitchen in Hebron.
The use of manipulated images and misinf: highlighting the lack of authenticity and credibility.
